content:
PLAN FOR A PROMO AT BAKERSFIELD'S BEST EVENT VENUE

SMALL MEETINGS, BIG IDEAS

Designed for teams of 10 to 30 people, the Padre Hotel small meeting package inspires big ideas. Whatever your goal, we'll customize your event for you. Keep it simple with our all-inclusive small meeting package or collaborate to create an unforgettable event.

YOUR BIG DAY, YOUR WAY

 

Download Our Padre Hotel Holiday Menu

Call today to start planning! 661-427-4900
